oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for soldier pension
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a receipt for David Dotson's pension payment. Dotson was a veteran of the Confederate army who lost half of his foot at the Battle of Franklin, Tennessee on November 30, 1864 as a member of Co. K, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Dotson was from Grainger County, Tenn. and returned there after the war. See also (davi 108).
